Dino Discovery 4x4 Game android:contentDescription Dino Discovery Play Background Play How To Play Settings Quit Game 4x4 ======= Settings Player: 0 Welcome to Dino Discovery Your task is to collect & excavate fossils from the dig site. Each pair of fossils discovered with provide you with points. The Dinosaur fossils & bones in question are from the 3 periods of the Mesozoic era. Those periods being the Triassic, Jurassic & Cretaceous periods Once all fossils have been collected the next round should begin & as your progress the board will grow & get bigger up to 6x6.
